title: Millimeter-Wave Beam Training Optimization: Interactive Design Based on Deep Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized task performance using real communication environment data and a feedback system construction

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles and constraints of beam training in millimeter-wave communication.
Learners can apply a deep reinforcement learning-based interactive learning model to beam training problems.
Learners can design and simulate efficient beam search algorithms in constrained environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
